actions.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Westerman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: Amendment to remove funds from the EPA bureaucracy, and places them into the US Forest Service's Forest and Rangeland Research Account, which funds the Forest Products Laboratory and Forest Inventory and Analysis, among other programs.
purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 114-683 to remove funds from the EPA bureaucracy, and places them into the US Forest Service's Forest and Rangeland Research Account, which funds the Forest Products Laboratory and Forest Inventory and Analysis, among other programs.
